RobustFileFilter - Class in gov.anl.ipns.Util.File
This class adds additional functionality to Java's FileFilter In addition to completing the methods that are abstract in FileFilter, it adds the capabilities to automatically ensure that the desired extension is put on the file name, as well as adding several other convenience methods.
